00019 #ifndef _BROADCASTER_DIRECTORY_HPP_cm111222_
00020 #define _BROADCASTER_DIRECTORY_HPP_cm111222_
00021 
00022 #include <map>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <sstream>
00025 
00026 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/regex.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00031 
00032 #include "logging.hpp"
00033 #include "network/protocol.hpp"
00034 
00035 namespace network {
00036   namespace broadcaster {
00037     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     // broadcaster directory
00039     //  * hold a set of data streams
00040     class directory {
00041     public:
00042       typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00043       typedef boost::shared_ptr<directory> sptr;
00044       typedef std::string index_type;
00045       typedef std::map<index_type, boost::uint32_t> directory_map;  // name -> unique stream number
00046       typedef directory_map::const_iterator const_iterator;
00047 
00048       // returns new stream id and a flag indicating if a new entry has been added
00049       std::pair<boost::uint32_t, bool> 
00050       insert(index_type name) {
00051         static boost::uint32_t unique_stream_number(1); // stream number 0 -> directory
00052         const_iterator i(directory_.find(name));
00053         if (i != end()) return std::make_pair(i->second, false);
00054         directory_.insert(std::make_pair(name, unique_stream_number));
00055         return std::make_pair(unique_stream_number++, true);
00056       }
00057       void insert(index_type name,
00058                   boost::uint32_t unique_stream_number) {
00059         assert(contains(name) == false);
00060         directory_.insert(std::make_pair(name, unique_stream_number));
00061       }
00062 
00063       static std::string id() { return "DIR_0000"; }
00064 
00065       std::string serialize(ptime t) const {
00066         std::string bytes_dir;
00067         for (const_iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i)
00068           bytes_dir += protocol::directory_entry::serialize(i->second, i->first);
00069         return bytes_dir;
00070       }
00071 
00072       void update(size_t n, const char* bytes) {
00073         directory_.clear();
00074         size_t i(0);
00075         while (i < n) {
00076           const protocol::directory_entry* de(reinterpret_cast<const protocol::directory_entry* >(bytes+i));
00077           const std::string name(bytes+i+protocol::directory_entry::name_offset(),
00078                                  bytes+i+protocol::directory_entry::name_offset() + de->length_of_name());
00079           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("directory::update (%04d,%d)") % de->stream_number() % name));
00080           directory_.insert(std::make_pair(name, de->stream_number()));
00081           i += de->size();
00082         }
00083         assert(i == n);
00084       }
00085 
00086       bool contains(index_type name) const {
00087         return directory_.find(name) != end();
00088       }
00089       bool contains(const boost::regex& e) const {
00090         for (const_iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i)
00091           if (regex_match(i->first, e)) return true;
00092         return regex_match("", e);
00093       }
00094 
00095       boost::uint32_t stream_number_of(index_type name) const {
00096         const_iterator i(directory_.find(name));
00097         assert(i != end());
00098         return i->second;
00099       }
00100 
00101       std::string stream_name_of(boost::uint32_t number) const {
00102         for (const_iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i)
00103           if (i->second == number) return i->first;
00104         throw std::runtime_error("no stream associated with this stream number");
00105       }
00106 
00107       std::string ls() const {
00108         std::ostringstream oss;
00109         for (const_iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i)
00110           oss << i->first << " " << i->second << "\n";
00111         oss << "\r\n";
00112         return oss.str();
00113       }
00114 
00115       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const directory& d) {
00116         for (directory::const_iterator i(d.begin()), iend(d.end()); i!=iend && os; ++i)
00117           os << i->first << " (" << i->second << ") ";
00118         return os;
00119       }
00120   
00121       const_iterator begin() const { return directory_.begin(); }
00122       const_iterator end()   const { return directory_.end(); }
00123     protected:
00124 
00125     private:
00126       directory_map directory_;
00127     } ;
00128 
00129   } // namespace broadcaster
00130 } // namespace network
00131 #endif // _BROADCASTER_DIRECTORY_HPP_cm111222_
